The story is a comic book series published by Sergio Bonelli Editore from October 2012.

Characteristic of the original series, which differentiates it from the classic production of Bonelli, is the lack of a main protagonist; In fact, every story, self-contained, is a story that ends with the register, even if they are not accounting followed by episodes already published. The genres covered in the stories are diverse, ranging from fantasy, science fiction, westerns, horror, settings, history and geography are the most diverse.

The series was created by Mauro Marcheselli, who proposed to Sergio Bonelli publishing of books on the model of hardbacks A man of adventure (1976 to 1980). The publishing house, aware that that kind of format in Italy has never had great success, he decided to get them out on the newsstands with the classic look Bonelli, taking the same foliation in use for Tex.

Roberto Recchioni showed some tables designed by Andrea Accardi for the redemption of the samurai as early as January 2011, but without clarifying what comics were references. The series was announced in May of that year, and confirmed by the publisher in March 2012.

In the summer of 2014 the debut Specials, annual supplements in color.
